Brook Lopez was drafted by New Jersey Nets, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position does Brook Lopez play?

Center.

What is Brook Lopez's net worth?

Brook Lopez has made at least $221,086,487 playing professional basketball.

How much does Brook Lopez make?

Brook Lopez made $25,000,000 in 2024.

What does Brook Lopez average?

Brook Lopez averages 6.6 points, 2.2 rebounds, and 0.6 assists per game.

How many rings does Brook Lopez have?

Brook Lopez has won one championship.

What schools did Brook Lopez attend?

Brook Lopez attended San Joaquin Memorial in Fresno, California and Stanford.

What are Brook Lopez's nicknames?

Splash Mountain, Bropez are nicknames for Brook Lopez.
